Package com.ibm.service

Class TimeTableServiceImpl

java.lang.Object
com.ibm.service.TimeTableServiceImpl
All Implemented Interfaces:
TimeTableService
@Service public class TimeTableServiceImpl extends Object implements TimeTableService
Implementation of the TimeTableService interface that manages movie time tables.

      Searches for a time table by date and screen.
      Specified by:
      searchByDateAndScreen in interface TimeTableService
      Parameters:
      ttr - the time table request containing the date and screen ID
      Returns:
      the found time table
      Throws:
      ScreenNotFoundException - if the screen with the specified ID does not exist
